abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews movie Risen, directed by Kevin Reynolds and starring Joseph Fiennes.
lead_paragraph: The producers, in trying to appeal to believers and nonbelievers alike, aim for drama in the story of Clavius, a Roman army tribune.

headline.main: Review: ‘Risen,’ a Tale of Conversion Starring Joseph Fiennes
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Risen,’ a Tale of Conversion Starring Joseph Fiennes

snippet: The producers, in trying to appeal to believers and nonbelievers alike, aim for drama in the story of Clavius, a Roman army tribune.
